name: Silentnight Comfort Pocket Essentials Memory Mattress, Single
description:
Our new Essentials range

The new essentials range from Silentnight offers great quality products at affordable prices.

Mirapocket® Spring system

Our Mirapocket® spring system will offers the following great benefits:

  • Offers various spring to meet your individual comfort needs, allowing you to find your perfect comfort solution for a great night's sleep.
  • Individual responsive spring system providing zoned support.
  • Pressure relief for a comfortable night's sleep.
  • Edge to edge support providing more presonal sleep space.

Memory Foam

Body moulding memory foam for pressure relief and soothing comfort.

Hypoallergenic

This mattress is hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant for a healthier sleep.

Quality Assurance

  • Accredited onsite laboratory to bring the best products to you.
  • Every Silentnight mattress type is tested to ensure it exceeds all British standards.
  • We are full members of the Furniture Industry Sustainability Program.

    • Fibre Content

    Sleep Surface - 100% Polyester
    Underside - 60% Polypropylene / 40% Polyester
    Side Border - 64% Polyester / 36% Polypropylene

    Listed spring counts are based on a king size mattress (measuring 5ft x 6ft 6in /150cm x 200cm). The amount of springs will alter on a pro-rata basis dependent on mattress size.
short_description:
• 1000 Mirapocket spring system
  • Body moulding memory foam
  • Hypoallergenic and dust mite free
  • Mattress Depth: 25cm
  • Comfort: Medium/Firm
mini_description:
• 1000 Mirapocket spring system
  • Body moulding memory foam
  • Hypoallergenic and dust mite free
  • Mattress Depth: 25cm
  • Comfort: Medium/Firm

name: Silentnight Comfort Essentials Mattress, Single
description:
Our new Essentials range

The new essentials range from Silentnight offers great quality products at affordable prices.

Miracoil® Spring system

The unique zoned Miracoil® spring system offers comfort and support for all shapes and sizes. Unlike an ordinary circular spring system, Miracoil's unique shape has twice as many springs offering improved pressure relief, edge to edge support for maximum sleep space and zoned support right where you need it most. Tried and tested Miracoil® Spring System also has enhanced durability providing superior comfort over many years. Our Miracoil® spring system will also offer the following benefits:

  • Edge to edge support providing more personal sleep space
  • No roll together ensuring less partner disturbance
  • Zoned support for perfect spinal alignment
  • Pressure relief for a comfortable night's sleep

Pressure relief

Pressure can build up into painful hotspots, causing pins and needles or aches and pains. Miracoil® spring systems give pressure relief for a comfortable night's sleep.

Quality Assurance
  • Accredited onsite laboratory to bring the best products to you.
  • Every Silentnight mattress type is tested to ensure it exceeds all British standards.
  • We are full members of the Furniture Industry Sustainability Program.

    • Fibre Content

    Sleep Surface - 64% Polyester / 36% Polypropylene
    Underside - 60% Polypropylene / 40% Polyester
    Side Border - 64% Polyester / 36% Polypropylene
short_description:
• Miracoil zoned spring system
  • Luxury loft mircro quilt cover
  • Hypoallergenic and dust mite free
  • Mattress Depth: 21cm
  • Comfort: Firm
mini_description:
• Miracoil zoned spring system
  • Luxury loft mircro quilt cover
  • Hypoallergenic and dust mite free
  • Mattress Depth: 21cm
  • Comfort: Firm

    Underside - 60% Polypropylene / 40% Polyester
    Side Border - 64% Polyester / 36% Polypropylene

    Listed spring counts are based on a king size mattress (measuring 5ft x 6ft 6in /150cm x 200cm). The amount of springs will alter on a pro-rata basis dependent on mattress size.
